TextView.android:text: Pet Patrol helps people find their lost pets worldwide. You can either choose to add a submission for a pet you have lost or an animal you think may be someone else's lost pet. If you are submitting a request for a lost pet, we will send you a notification when someone else has found an animal whose description has at least a 50% match with your pet. If you have found an animal that looks like it may be someone else's, you can submit a description of the animal you have found and we will find the three most recent matches above 50% for that animal. After you decide which most closely resembles the animal you found, we will send a notification to that person with your contact information so you can help that person reunite with his or her lost pet. :)
